entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
